item.title: Projects
item.description: TTT C#, SCSS, s&box (Present) TTT is the re-imagining of the popular Garry’s Mod TTT game built for s&box (built on Valve’s Source 2 engine) Programmed core mechanics for the project (Round system, weapons system, spectating, etc.) Actively reviewed, managed contributions, and handled issues on the GitHub page Action Tag C#, SCSS, s&box, Blender (Sept 2021) Action Quake inspired modification for the game engine s&box Modeled and animated the player viewmodels within Blender Built the map using Valve’s Hammer 2 mapping tool Retter - Flutter Reddit App Dart, Flutter (Jun 2020)
